metadata.title: USN-5609-1 -- .NET 6 vulnerability
metadata.description: Graham Esau discovered that .NET 6 incorrectly parsed certain payloads during model binding. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5609-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dotnet-sdk-6.0-source-built-artifacts - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-hostfxr-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet6 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-templates-6.0 - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-host - 6.0.109-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required
